Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Mutant embryos have reduced size , fail to gastrulate or express a mesodermal marker , and show abnormal visceral endoderm development .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Embryonic development disorders (with symptoms including reduced size, failure to gastrulate, and absence or abnormal expression of mesodermal marker) |
| Gastrulation disorders |
| Abnormal visceral endoderm development |
